brief.brief: The method to use when calculating the alert time.
If selected (set to true), each option displays other field(s) to qualify the alert time setting.

detail.detail: Service Manager displays this field as mutually exclusive radio buttons:
- Use an expression to set the alert time
- Use field in a record + a specified interval
The valid values that can be stored in this field are:
- expression (Use an expression to set the alert time)
- field (Use field in a record + a specified interval)
If you select "Use field in a record + a specified interval", the following fields work in conjunction with the Alert Calculation Type field:
calc.time.field (Name Of The Field To Be Used In Calculating Alert Time).
calc.interval (Duration (Length Of Time) To Be Added In Calculating Alert Time)
If you select "Use expression to set $L.alert.tz", the following field works in conjunction with the Alert Calculation Type field.
